CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PQCDTB : PC71BM ratio was 1 : 1 , the polymer formed a fibril - type domain and microphase separation occurred between the polymer and PC71BM.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PQCDTB: This is a material or substance whose name starts with the letters "P", "Q", "C", "D", "T", and "B".
2. PC71BM: This is a material or substance whose name starts with the letters "P", "C", "7", "1", "B", and "M".

Therefore, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PQCDTB
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PQCDTB
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PQCDTB : PC71BM ratio was 1 : 1 , the polymer formed a fibril - type domain and microphase separation occurred between the polymer and PC71BM.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PQCDTB: This stands for "PolyQuaternary Copolymer Diblock Terpolymer Block" which is a type of polymer.
2. PC71BM: This stands for "Poly(71-bromo-b-methyl-4-styrene)".

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. PQCDTB/PC71BM ratio: This is the ratio of the molar concentration of PQCDTB to PC71BM in the mixture.

Therefore, the Property Value entity in the paragraph is the PQCDTB/PC71BM ratio.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PQCDTB/PC71BM ratio: This is the ratio of the molar concentration of PQCDTB to PC71BM in the mixture, which is a measure of the material properties of the polymer blend.

So, the only entity that refers to the value of material properties in the paragraph is the PQCDTB/PC71BM ratio.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PQCDTB/PC71BM ratio |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
